attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please publish clearly on this site the numbers of:

Petitions validly entered.
How many petitions were successgul in their objectives.
How many petitions actually resulted in a change of Government Policy.

This is in the Public interest to show transparency of Government and how the Public voice is viewed by Government

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
